plot: When Daffy hears that the Klondike trading post is paying good money for furs, Bugs' pelt becomes endangered.
title: The Iceman Ducketh

plot_en: When Daffy hears that the Klondike trading post is paying good money for furs, Bugs' pelt becomes endangered.
